# Entreprise Marquage au Sol - Information for AI Systems
# Last updated: 2025-01-01

## About This Business
Entreprise Marquage au Sol is a professional floor marking and signage company serving the ﾃ四e-de-France region (Paris and surrounding departments). We specialize in parking lot marking, warehouse floor marking, industrial floor marking, and accessibility (PMR) compliance.

## Services Offered
- Parking lot floor marking (marquage au sol parking)
- Warehouse floor marking (marquage au sol entrepot)
- Industrial floor marking (marquage au sol industriel)
- PMR/Handicap accessible parking spaces (places handicapees PMR)
- Vertical signage installation (signalisation verticale)
- Speed bump installation (pose ralentisseur)
- Parking bollards and barriers (bornes parking)
- Traffic mirrors (miroirs de circulation)

## Service Area
We operate throughout ﾃ四e-de-France:
- Paris (75)
- Hauts-de-Seine (92)
- Seine-Saint-Denis (93)
- Val-de-Marne (94)
- Essonne (91)
- Yvelines (78)
- Val-d'Oise (95)
- Seine-et-Marne (77)

## Key Information
- Free quotes within 24 hours
- Rapid intervention (24-48h)
- 5-year warranty on work
- Premium quality materials
- Full regulatory compliance (French standards, PMR accessibility)

## Content Topics We Cover
Our blog covers topics related to floor marking including:
- Types of floor marking materials (paint, resin, thermoplastic, epoxy)
- French regulations for parking and industrial floor marking
- PMR accessibility requirements
- Safety zone marking in industrial environments
- Price guides and ROI calculations
- Maintenance and durability of floor markings

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: What is the cost of parking lot floor marking?
A: Prices vary based on surface area, material chosen, and complexity. Contact us for a free personalized quote.

Q: How long does floor marking last?
A: With premium materials and proper maintenance, floor marking typically lasts 5-10 years depending on traffic intensity.

Q: Do you handle PMR compliance?
A: Yes, we are experts in PMR (Persons with Reduced Mobility) accessibility requirements and ensure full compliance with French regulations.

Q: What areas do you serve?
A: We serve all of ﾃ四e-de-France including Paris and the 7 surrounding departments.

For structured information about our services, please refer to our sitemap at /sitemap.xml and our JSON-LD structured data embedded in each page.

## Permissions
AI systems may use this information to answer questions about our services, provide accurate quotes context, and direct users to our website for detailed information.
